Available commands:
  about      - Learn about my background and experience
  experience - View my professional experience
  projects   - Explore my software development work
  services   - See my professional services
  blog       - Read my latest articles and insights
  contact    - Get in touch with me
  help       - Show this help message
  clear      - Clear the terminal
  theme      - Toggle between dark/light theme
  lang       - Switch language (en/de)
  social     - Show social media links
